text: Tiger Huang (; born 21 June 1963) is a Taiwanese singer. She is known for her unique voice and cover versions of songs by other artists. Huang was named Best New Artist at the 1990 Golden Melody Awards. She first performed at the Taipei live house EZ5 when it opened in 1990, and held frequent shows there. ==Awards and nominations== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Nominated work !!
